computedFields.name: AccountActive
computedFields.saqlExpression: case when ('Customer_Status__c' == "Customer" || 'BVNotAttrit.AttrittedStatus' =="No") then "Active" else "Not Active" end
computedFields.label: AccountActive

computedFields.name: SuccessSegment
computedFields.saqlExpression:
case
when 'Account.Success_Segment__c' is not null then 'Account.Success_Segment__c'
else "BLANK"
end
computedFields.label: SuccessSegment

computedFields.name: AOVBand
computedFields.saqlExpression:
case
when 'Account.AOV_Band__c' is not null then 'Account.AOV_Band__c'
else "BLANK"
end
computedFields.label: AOVBand

computedFields.name: AccountNameFinal
computedFields.saqlExpression:
case
when 'Account.Name' is not null then 'Account.Name'
else "BLANK"
end
computedFields.label: AccountNameFinal

computedFields.name: CompanyNameFinal
computedFields.saqlExpression:
case
when 'Company.Name' is not null then 'Company.Name'
else "BLANK"
end
computedFields.label: CompanyNameFinal

computedFields.name: SMJobCodeFinal
computedFields.saqlExpression:
case
when 'SM.SM_Job_Code' is not null then 'SM.SM_Job_Code'
else "BLANK"
end
computedFields.label: SMJobCodeFinal

computedFields.name: CSGCoverage
computedFields.saqlExpression:
case
when 'Account.CSG_Coverage__c' is not null then 'Account.CSG_Coverage__c'
else "BLANK"
end
computedFields.label: CSGCoverage

computedFields.name: CoreSupportLevel
computedFields.saqlExpression:
case
when 'Account.SupportLevel__c' is not null then 'Account.SupportLevel__c'
else "BLANK"
end
computedFields.label: CoreSupportLevel

computedFields.name: IsSela
computedFields.saqlExpression:
case
when 'Blaze.IS_SELA' is not null then 'Blaze.IS_SELA'
else "BLANK"
end
computedFields.label: IsSela

computedFields.name: ComboCompanyHasBV
computedFields.saqlExpression: case when 'ComboCompany.AccountHasBV' =="Yes" then "Yes" else "No" end
computedFields.label: ComboCompanyHasBV

computedFields.name: Account_Id_15
computedFields.saqlExpression: substr('AccountId_Final',1,15)
computedFields.label: Account_Id_15

computedFields.name: UserHasBV
computedFields.saqlExpression: case when 'BVSingleLookup.Id' is not null then "Yes" else "No" end
computedFields.label: HasBV

computedFields.name: TotalSM
computedFields.saqlExpression:
case when (('JobCode__c' matches "463C" or 'JobCode__c' matches "430C") and 'LastLoginDate'>= "2020-02-00T00:00:00.000Z" and ('MgmtChain03.Name' in ["Simon Short"] or 'MgmtChain04.Name' in ["Kaname Miyata"] ) and 'IsActive'=="true") or
 (('JobCode__c' matches "199C" ) and 'LastLoginDate'>= "2020-02-00T00:00:00.000Z" and ('MgmtChain03.Name' in ["Simon Short"] or 'MgmtChain04.Name' in ["Kaname Miyata"] ) and 'IsActive'=="true") then "Yes" else "No" end
computedFields.label: TotalSM

computedFields.name: SPStatus
computedFields.saqlExpression: case when 'Lifecycle__c' == "Steady State" then "Completed" else "InProgress" end
computedFields.label: SPStatus

computedFields.name: SPDaysSinceLastModified
computedFields.saqlExpression: daysBetween(toDate(CreatedDate_sec_epoch), now() )
computedFields.label: SPDaysSinceLastModified

computedFields.name: AccountHasBV
computedFields.saqlExpression: case when 'BVSingleLookup.Id' is not null then "Yes" else "No" end
computedFields.label: AccountHasBV

computedFields.name: HasHighestAOV
computedFields.saqlExpression: case when 'HighestAOVAccountId' == 'Id' then "True" else "False" end
computedFields.label: HasHighestAOV

computedFields.name: HasHighestAOVCountry
computedFields.saqlExpression: case when 'CountryHighestAOVAccountId' == 'Id' then "True" else "False" end
computedFields.label: HasHighestAOVCountry

computedFields.name: CustomWhatId
computedFields.saqlExpression: case when('WhatId' in ["-BLANK-"] or 'WhatId' is null) then "BLANKWhatId" else 'WhatId' end
computedFields.label: CustomWhatId

computedFields.name: ComboCompanyBVStatus
computedFields.saqlExpression: case when 'ComboCompleted.AccountBVStatus' is not null then "Completed" when 'ComboCompleted.AccountBVStatus' is null and 'ComboIncomplete.AccountBVStatus' is not null then "Incomplete" when 'ComboCompleted.AccountBVStatus' is null and 'ComboIncomplete.AccountBVStatus' is null then "No BV Record" else "others" end
computedFields.label: ComboCompanyBVStatus

computedFields.name: LeadSMNameFinal
computedFields.saqlExpression: case when 'LeadSM.Name' is null then "No Lead SM Assigned" else 'LeadSM.Name' end
computedFields.label: LeadSMNameFinal

computedFields.name: AccountBVStatus
computedFields.saqlExpression:
case when 'BVCompleted.BVStatus' =="Completed" and 
'BVIncomplete.BVStatus'=="Incomplete" then "Completed" when  'BVCompleted.BVStatus' =="Completed" and 
'BVIncomplete.BVStatus' is null then "Completed" when  'BVCompleted.BVStatus' is null and 
'BVIncomplete.BVStatus'=="Incomplete" then "Incomplete" else "No BV Record" end
computedFields.label: AccountBVStatus

computedFields.name: SuccessPathTaskType
computedFields.saqlExpression: case when 'Subject' matches "#AG" then "Auto Generated" else "Custom" end
computedFields.label: SuccessPathTaskType

computedFields.name: SPTaskDaysSinceModified
computedFields.saqlExpression: daysBetween(toDate(SPTaskLastmodifiedDate_sec_epoch), now() )
computedFields.label: SPTaskDaysSinceModified

computedFields.name: CompassAccountId
computedFields.saqlExpression:
case when 'HighestAOV.HighestAOV.HighestAOVAccountId' is not null then 'HighestAOV.HighestAOV.HighestAOVAccountId' 
 when 'HighestAOV.CountryHighestAOV.CountryHighestAOVAccountId' is not null then 'HighestAOV.CountryHighestAOV.CountryHighestAOVAccountId' 
else 'Account__c' end
computedFields.label: CompassAccountId

computedFields.name: BvHasCustomerContact
computedFields.saqlExpression: case when ('Contact_1__c' is null and 'Contact_2__c' is null and 'Contact_3__c' is null) then "No" else "Yes" end
computedFields.label: BvHasCustomerContact

computedFields.name: BvSentiment
computedFields.saqlExpression: case when 'Sentiment__c' is null then "NA" else 'Sentiment__c' end
computedFields.label: BvSentiment

computedFields.saqlExpression: case when 'Contact1.Business_Sponsor__c' =="true" or 'Contact1.IT_Sponsor__c' =="true" or 'Contact2.Business_Sponsor__c' =="true" or 'Contact2.IT_Sponsor__c' =="true" or 'Contact3.Business_Sponsor__c' =="true" or 'Contact3.IT_Sponsor__c' =="true" then "Yes" else "No" end
computedFields.name: BVHasValidCustomerContact
computedFields.label: BVHasValidCustomerContact

computedFields.name: BVStatus
computedFields.saqlExpression: case when ('RecordType.Name' in ["Success Path - Business Objectives"]  and 'Customer_s_Business_Objective__c' is not null and 'Contact_1__c' is not null and 'Sentiment__c' is not null and 'Customer_s_Business_Objective__c' not in ["test"] and ('Salesforce_Metric_Success_Path__c' is not null or 'Success_Measure__c' is not null ) and 'BVHasValidCustomerContact'=="Yes") then "Completed" else "Incomplete" end
computedFields.label: BVStatus

computedFields.name: AccountId_Final
computedFields.saqlExpression:
case
when ('Case.AccountId' is not null) then 'Case.AccountId'
when ('Compass.CompassAccountId' is not null) then 'Compass.CompassAccountId'
when ('ActionPlan.Compass.CompassAccountId' is not null) then 'ActionPlan.Compass.CompassAccountId'
when ('ConsumptionPlan.Account__c' is not null) then 'ConsumptionPlan.Account__c'
when ('ExecSpon.Account_LookUp__c' is not null) then 'ExecSpon.Account_LookUp__c'
when ( 'PE.Account__c' is not null) then 'PE.Account__c'
when ('Opp.AccountId' is not null) then 'Opp.AccountId'
when ( 'RedAccount.Red_Account__c' is not null) then 'RedAccount.Red_Account__c'
when ( 'GlobalCompany.Id' is not null) then 'GlobalCompany.Id'
when ( 'CountryCompany.Id' is not null) then 'CountryCompany.Id'
else 'AccountId'
end
computedFields.label: AccountId_Final

computedFields.name: HasCompanyOnly
computedFields.saqlExpression: case when 'Account__c' is null and 'Company__c' is not null then "True" else "False" end
computedFields.label: HasCompanyOnly

computedFields.name: CompanyId_Final
computedFields.saqlExpression: 'Account.Global_Company__c'
computedFields.label: CompanyId_Final

computedFields.name: AccountSPStatus
computedFields.saqlExpression:
case when 'SPCompleted.SPStatus' =="Completed" and 
'SPInprogress.SPStatus'=="InProgress" then "Completed" when  'SPCompleted.SPStatus' =="Completed" and 
'SPInprogress.SPStatus' is null then "Completed" when  'SPCompleted.SPStatus' is null and 
'SPInprogress.SPStatus'=="InProgress" then "InProgress" else "No SP Record" end
computedFields.label: AccountSPStatus

computedFields.name: AOVTotal
computedFields.saqlExpression: coalesce('Total_AOV__c',0)
computedFields.label: AOVTotal
